landingPage.introduction: Check if your publishing workflow is compatible with specifications of the Content Authenticity Initiative so that you can publish authentic media to the web and be prepared for the future of a more authentic web.

summary.componentCountHint: {compatibleCount}/{totalCount} component is compatible | {compatibleCount}/{totalCount} components are compatible
summary.addComponentsHint: Please add components to your workflow

toasts.missingTitle: Workflow could not be {action}. Please assign a name at the top of your screen.
toasts.error: Workflow could not be {action}. Please try again.
toasts.loadComponentsError: Could not load components. Please try again.

clearWorkflowPrompt.title: Clear workflow
clearWorkflowPrompt.message: Are you sure you want to clear the workflow? This action cannot be undone.

saveInterception.title: Save workflow
saveInterception.message: You are working on an already saved workflow. Do you want to overwrite it or save it as a new one?

addAlternative.title: Add alternative
addAlternative.message: Are you sure you want to replace "{oldComponent}" with "{newComponent}"?

deleteComponent.error: The component can't be deleted as it has multiple incoming and outgoing connections that can't be properly resolved. Please reduce either the incoming or outgoing side to a singular component.

unsavedPageLeave.title: Unsaved changes
unsavedPageLeave.message: You changed your workflow in a way that has not been saved yet. Are you sure you want to leave the page?

addComponentModal.title: Add component
addComponentModal.versionInterception: Is your Version of {component} equal to or greater than {version}?
addComponentModal.noResults: No matching components found, but you can add a custom one as an alternative.

errors.categoryNotCorrectType: This category does not contain components that can be added to the workflow at the selected position.

sharedModal.title: Shared workflow
sharedModal.success: Your workflow was shared successfully. You can now copy the link below and share it.
sharedModal.hintReshare: If you change something on your workflow you will need to share it again, as a new link will be created.

closeInterception.title: Unsaved changes
closeInterception.message: You made changes to your custom component that have not been updated yet. Are you sure you want to discard these changes?

customComponentModal.typeNotAllowed: This type cannot be placed at the selected position.

deleteWorkflowConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the workflow "{name}"?
deleteAllWorkflowsConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete all saved workflows?

externalImage.name: External image
externalImage.modalPrompt: Does the external image have CAI metadata?

compatibilityLegend.partialExplanation: The connection itself is compatibility, but a previous component is not compatible and thus breaks the chain of CAI-compatible metadata.

typeExplanation.title: Type explanation
typeExplanation.input: A component that can produce an image from scratch. For example a camera or generative AI model.
typeExplanation.input-output: A component that needs an input image and produces a changed version of that image as an output. For example image manipulation software like Photoshop or a tool to resize and compress images.
typeExplanation.output: A component that needs an input image and produces a changed version of that image as an output. For example image manipulation software like Photoshop or a tool to resize and compress images.

pageNotFound: Sorry, the page you are looking for unfortunately does not exist.
